channel.title: Glitch, help
channel.description:
ok im using project v1.2
when i click logout, it sends a giant glitch message
if u click it 5 times, it says the giant glitch message 5 times
heres a picture of wat it looks like when my friend clicked log out a few times...
[IMG]http://i283.photobucket.com/albums/kk310/silabgarza/00.jpg[/img]
how do i just make it just say "+playername+" logged out
and not friken spam that shit, please and ty

item.title: Glitch, help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok im using project v1.2

when i click logout, it sends a giant glitch message

if u click it 5 times, it says the giant glitch message 5 times

heres a picture of wat it looks like when my friend clicked log out a few times…

how do i just make it just say “+playername+” logged out

and not friken spam that shit, please and ty
